channel.title: Help - Project 16
channel.description:
I need help with the following... -Adding tutorial island to my server -Adding commands -Making it so only admins can do commands
WHEN I EDIT MY CLIENT JAVA IT NEVER WORKS FOR ME!!! :mad: Do i have to compile? plz help, what am i doing wrong :| What do i have to do exactly to add tutorial island, add commands, make admin commands only??? Where do i put them? Positive they will work??? :confused:
Sorry im a noob Thanks for everything
- Merry Christmas!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :D

item.title: Help - Project 16
item.dc:creator: @martti012 martti012
item.description:
@martti012 wrote:

  1. tutorial island is ALWAYS there and u can go there by typing(hybridscape only i think if u are admin then servers too) ::tele 3094,3107

2.download voule command generator(search on downloads category). its good generator, easy to use and there can be supports this. i get an example with additem to moderator(player rights 1)

example:

if(command.startsWith(“moneymoney”)&& playerRights >= 1){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(0995,999999999);

}

3.open client.java and search commands list(: or if(command.startswith) or something and be very careful putting command(i failed from first time i dont tried second time lol)i dont know well

hope it helps

Read full topic
